text: Great spot to satisfy your craving for a Philly cheesesteak sandwich.  Also I loved the house made French fries and scratch lemonade.  Keep up the good work guys !
It was was marginal. I got a steak burger and it was dried out and was more like jerky. Baked potato was alright though

Ordered the #1 without the fried egg.  The meat was seasoned, slightly too much mayo, but....  The fries were fresh, the lemonade was smacking and the service was quick, professional and easy.  Good stuff!  Fye, fye, fye, fye, fye.
